pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, November 9, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, November 9, 2017:

All times local.

Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

11:10 a.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.

Tan Son Nhat International Airport

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity upon arrival

1:05 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a gong ceremony.

Lobby, Main Floor
Ho Chi Minh Stock Exchange

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a business roundtable and will deliver remarks.

Press Room, Main Floor
Ho Chi Minh Stock Exchange

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver brief remarks at Ton Duc Thang University.

Auditorium, 2nd Floor
Ton Duc Thang University

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

3:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will have an armchair discussion with Bloomberg BNA journalist Lien Hoang.

Auditorium, 2nd Floor
Ton Duc Thang University

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

5 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the chairman of the Ho Chi Minh People’s Committee.

Red Room, 2nd Floor
People’s Committee Headquarters

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a reception given by the Ambassador of Canada to Vietnam, Ping Kitnikone.

Park Hyatt Saigon

Closed to media
